attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too often bags of lettuce are being sold filled with fancy Rocket and other exotic types. 
It seems the days of our indigenous lettuce is numbered and only we, the consumer can save it from extinction. 
We blame the rise in celebrity chefs and European café culture. 

Save our lettuce otherwise it will vanish forever.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
